channel.title: Mongodb on Columbia DSI Scholars
channel.description: Recent content in Mongodb on Columbia DSI Scholars

item.title: Project: Project ToxicDocs
item.description: We house the world’s largest dataset of once-secret documents on industrial pollution, unleashed from the vaults of corporations like DuPont, Dow, and Monsanto in toxic tort litigation. We are applying data science methods to analyze and render this material useable to a broad audience.
